SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT COM_NO , INSTA_IMG_SRC , INSTA_IMG_CHANGE FROM TB_INSTAGRAM LEFT JOIN TB_INSTA_IMAGE IMG ON (COM_NO = REF_CNO) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY UPLOAD_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COM_NO , INSTA_IMG_SRC , INSTA_IMG_CHANGE FROM TB_INSTAGRAM LEFT JOIN TB_INSTA_IMAGE IMG ON (COM_NO = REF_CNO) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY UPLOAD_DATE DESC

SELECT INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_SRC , COUNT(LIKE_NO) FROM TB_INSTAGRAM LEFT JOIN TB_INSTA_IMAGE ON (COM_NO = REF_CNO) LEFT JOIN TB_LIKE USING (COM_NO) WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_SRC ORDER BY 3 DESC
INSERT INTO TB_ANSWER_INSTAGRAM ( ANS_NO , ANS_CONTENT , COM_NO , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANSWER_INSTAGRAM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT ANS_NO , ANS_CONTENT , MEM_ID , TO_CHAR(ANS_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') "ANS_DATE" FROM TB_ANSWER_INSTAGRAM AN JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE AN.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COM_NO = ? ORDER BY ANS_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO TB_INSTAGRAM ( COM_NO , COM_CONTENT , INSTA_ID , COM_TAG , MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INSTAGRAM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_INSTA_IMAGE ( INSTA_IMG_NO , REF_CNO , INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_CHANGE , INSTA_IMG_SRC ) VALUES ( SEQ_INSTA_IMAGE.NEXTVAL , SEQ_INSTAGRAM.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COM_NO , INS.INSTA_ID , COM_CONTENT , COM_TAG , MEM_ID FROM TB_INSTAGRAM INS JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE COM_NO = ?
SELECT INSTA_IMG_NO , INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN , INSTA_IMG_CHANGE , INSTA_IMG_SRC FROM TB_INSTA_IMAGE WHERE REF_CNO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_FOLLOW ( FOLLOW_NO , FOLLOWER_ID , FOLLOWING_ID , ACT_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_FOLLOW.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , 'Y' )
UPDATE TB_FOLLOW SET ACT_YN = 'N' WHERE FOLLOWER_ID = ? AND FOLLOWING_ID = ( SELECT MEM_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE INSTA_ID = ( SELECT INSTA_ID FROM TB_INSTAGRAM WHERE COM_NO = ? ) )
INSERT INTO TB_LIKE ( LIKE_NO , MEM_NO , COM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_LIKE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
DELETE FROM TB_LIKE WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND COM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_INSTAGRAM SET COM_CONTENT = ? , INSTA_ID = ? , COM_TAG = ? WHERE COM_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_INSTA_IMAGE SET INSTA_IMG_ORIGIN = ? , INSTA_IMG_CHANGE = ? , INSTA_IMG_SRC = ? WHERE INSTA_IMG_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_INSTAGRAM SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE COM_NO = ?
